message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $12,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to stay within a tighter budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand you're looking to stay within a tighter budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10,500. This is my best price for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand you're still a bit above budget, but I'm not willing to go below $11,000. I'm willing to compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $11,000. This is my best price for now.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $11,200, which is still a good price for me. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $11,200, but I'm still a bit above budget. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm not willing to go below $11,500, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. I'm counteroffering at $11,350. This is my best price for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me again, but I'm still a bit above budget. I'm willing to pay $10,900 for the product. Can you consider this price?
